resources.string: Choose the number of decks used. Decks are standard 52-card decks.\nMinimum deck amount: 1\nMaximum deck amount: 5
Choose if to include jokers. Each deck used has two jokers. E.g. when using two decks there will be 4 jokers total.
Choose if to return or retain the drawn card. If you choose to return the card, it is put to a random place in the deck. Retained cards are removed from the deck.
Choose the number of die used. All the die will be of the same type.\nMinimum number of die: 1\nMaximum number of die: 10
Choose the type of die used. All the die will be of the same type. Standard dice type (4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 20) are available.
